name: Character Creation Pipeline
steps: Determine ability scores (standard array, point buy, or rolling with DM approval).
Fill in numbers (HP, proficiency bonus, AC, attacks, saving throws, passive perception).
Describe the character (appearance, personality, ideals, bonds, flaws, backstory).
